title: Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.
description: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime.
description: With the help of allies Lt. Jim Gordon and DA Harvey Dent, Batman is able to keep a tight lid on crime in Gotham City until a vile young criminal calling himself the Joker creates havoc.

title: The Hangover
summary: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night.
description: Two days before his wedding, Doug and three friends drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. When the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't find Doug.

title: Parasite
summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
description: The Kim family lives a difficult life in a small semi-basement apartment. When the son gets a job tutoring for a wealthy family, the Kims start to infiltrate their household.

title: The Conjuring
summary: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.
description: In 1971, Carolyn and Roger Perron move their family into a dilapidated Rhode Island farmhouse and soon strange things start happening around them.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler.
description: Years after the collapse of civilization, the tyrannical Immortal Joe enslaves apocalypse survivors inside the desert fortress the Citadel.

title: Superbad
summary: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety.
description: Seth and Evan are best friends who are about to graduate high school. They are invited to a party and spend the day trying to buy alcohol for it.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers.

title: A Quiet Place
summary: A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.
description: If they hear you, they hunt you. A family must navigate their lives in absolute silence after mysterious creatures that hunt by sound take over the earth.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary: A writer encounters the owner of a high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years.
description: In the 1930s, the Grand Budapest Hotel is a popular European ski resort, presided over by concierge Gustave H. Zero, a junior lobby boy, becomes Gustave's friend and protege.

title: Avengers: Endgame
summary: The Avengers assemble once more in order to restore balance to the universe.
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more.

title: Get Out
summary: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend.
description: Chris and his girlfriend Rose have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, and she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with Missy and Dean.

title: Dune
summary: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel.
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe.

title: Hereditary
summary: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.
description: When Ellen, the matriarch of the Graham family, passes away, her daughter's family begins to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry.

title: The Nice Guys
summary: A private eye and a hired enforcer team up to investigate a mysterious disappearance.
description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a mysterious case involving a missing girl and the death of a porn star.
